question: By the time they arrived at the party, the band ________ already started playing.
She ________ lost her keys before she even left the house.
We ________ been to Paris before last summer.
After they finished dinner, they ________ tired.
My phone ________ broken when I tripped and fell.
By the time I woke up at noon, the sun ________ already set.
They ________ graduated by the time their parents arrived for the ceremony.
We ________ eaten breakfast before the meeting started at 9:00 AM.
She ________ finished writing her novel before the deadline.
He ________ already packed his bags by the time she told him they weren't going on vacation.
She ________ never seen such a beautiful sunset before.
They ________ started the meeting when I arrived.
________ you finished your homework yet?
I ________ eaten lunch before I went to the gym.
By the time they arrived, the store ________ already closed.
The underwriter ________ it clear before he left.
The baby ________ on the floor when the mother arrived.
I ________ the ribbons before you prevented me.
The child ________ the aid of the bystanders before police aid came.
The soldier ________ into the tunnel when the fisherman saw her.
